title: Track Premiere: Wealth – Sunburned
content:
Our first introduction to Wealth was way back in May. The ever-reliable Housewarming Records brought him to our attentions; he had just been signed by them and released a tropical little banger to prove his worth. It’s been a few months now and Wealth is back with a jam to end the summer. The tropical and sun soaked sounds are still ever present, yet there’s a remarkable new level of scope to the sound. The work is less thin in its delivery, describing it as epic might be a bit general, but it comes remarkably close. The new single, Sunburned, comes out tomorrow along with an unheard B-side. For now stream the new single below and check in at Housewarming Records’ Band Camp page tomorrow to pick up the single for free.

Wealth – Sunburned by crackintheroad
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
